doc:
Sam Theard https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sam_Theard 0 Samuel Allen Theard (October 10, 1904 – December 7, 1982) was an American singer, songwriter, actor, and comedian. He performed under the names Lovin' Sam Theard, Spo-Dee-O-Dee, and others. Samuel_Allen_Theard ( October_10_,_1904 – December_7_,_1982 ) was an_American_singer , songwriter , actor , and comedian . He performed under the_names_Lovin '_Sam_Theard , Spo-Dee-O-Dee , and others .
